p: Different fats/oils have various chemical and physical properties. Pure vegetable oils can have low functional characterization or nutritional properties. For example, using olive oil or sesame oil alone has some drawbacks such as their low amount of ω3 essential fatty acids. Instead, flaxseed oil is a rich source of ω3, tocopherols and other bioactive compounds,2 but in pure form it is very unstable and oxidizes quickly.
